data.title: HADES: Hexadecapolar Analysis for Dust Estimation in Simulations (of CMB B-mode thermal dust emission)
data.name: HADES
data.description: A Hexadecapolar Analysis for Dust Estimation in Simulations (of CMB B-mode thermal dust emission)

evidence: "This is a Python package to analyse dust levels in simulated CMB galactic dust maps with realistic experimental noise and lensing configurations."
"A tutorial is included here (https://github.com/oliverphilcox/HADES/blob/master/Tutorial.ipynb)" indicating use directly from the repository.
"The code in this repository forms the basis of the MNRAS paper of Philcox, Sherwin & van Engelen (2018)..." showing it directly underpins research results.
